events.title: QURECA
events.content: Dr. Araceli Venegas-Gomez, the founder and CEO of QURECA - quantum resources and careers will give a talk regarding the quantum industry, and where we can fit into it following our bachelor/master/PhD. If you wish start working in the quantum industry next year, this talk is definitely for you!

events.title: NQCC Hackathon
events.content:
UK's National Quantum Computing Center first Hackathon!
"The Hackathon by the NQCC in collaboration with QuantX is a technical hackathon aimed at addressing the whole quantum computing value chain to demonstrate its ability to tackle real-world problems in a variety of sectors".
